welcome_message_body: Welcome to Hinckley, a charming town in the heart of the United Kingdom known for its beautiful scenery, historical landmarks, and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that Hinckley has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at West Midlands International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at West Midlands International Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free WiFi network throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Birmingham Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Birmingham Airport is dedicated to serving low-cost and charter airlines.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Birmingham Airport serves primarily international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at East Midlands Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at East Midlands Airport, mainly used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited coverage in certain areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cottesmor RAF Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Cottesmor RAF Airport is exclusively for military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited coverage in certain areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nottingham Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal.
